Topic.Title: Expect DELL to dip down toward $10.25 - $10.00

Message.Msg: It will dip even lower when nobody buys a Windows 8 desktop computer.

Topic.Title: Expect DELL to dip down toward $10.25 - $10.00

Message.Msg: Nothing goes straight down. GUARANTEED you will see a bounce of a few dollars before resuming any downtrend. Ideal stock for a short term trade to the upside, especially with a market as manipulated as the one we are in. LOL Worse off than in 2008/2009, and stocks are higher. We have nations on the verge of collapse, US debt at all time highs, most people on government assistance & food stamps in the history of the USA, housing still a disaster, and a horrible jobs situation. Dow should be LOWER than 2008, not higher.
